movies.title: Igualita a mi
movies.plot: Refusing to face his adulthood, a Casanova must deal with the fact that he has a young pregnant daughter from an earlier relationship.
movies.simplePlot: Refusing to face his adulthood, a Casanova must deal with the fact that he has a young pregnant daughter from an earlier relationship.

biography.placeOfBirth: Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Argentina
biography.bio: Florencia Bertotti was born on March 15, 1983 in Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Argentina as María Florencia Bertotti. She is an actress and producer, known for Sweethearts (2002), The Chairwoman (2012) and Igualita a mi (2010). She was previously married to Guido Kaczka.
biography.name: Florencia Bertotti

biography.placeOfBirth: Queens, New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Started his career as a teen actor in Pelito. He is the son of an actress. After appearing in several shows, he decided he wanted to be a producer, too. His company is called Polka. When working in La banda del Golden Rocket (1991), he met model/actress Araceli González and after some time they got married. Now he holds a very important position working for a TV channel.
biography.name: Adrián Suar

biography.bio: Claudia Fontán was born on October 4, 1966 in Hurlingham, Buenos Aires, Argentina. She is an actress, known for Sweethearts (2002), Los únicos (2011) and Los exitosos Pells (2008). She has been married to Matias Aubi since 2002. They have one child.
biography.name: Claudia Fontán

biography.bio: Gabriel Chame is known for his work on Agents Super Zero (2014), Igualita a mi (2010) and 8 Dates (2008).
biography.name: Gabriel Chame

biography.bio: Ana María Castel was born on October 31, 1942 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. She is an actress, known for Los únicos (2011), Igualita a mi (2010) and So Feared a Hell (1980).
biography.name: Ana María Castel

biography.placeOfBirth: Buenos Aires City, Distrito Federal, Argentina
biography.bio: Juan Carlos Galván was born on June 26, 1932 in Buenos Aires City, Distrito Federal, Argentina as Juan Carlos Garcia Galvan. He was an actor, known for Miss Bala (2011), Casi ángeles (2007) and Igualita a mi (2010). He died on January 30, 2015 in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
biography.name: Juan Carlos Galván

biography.bio: Andres Ciavaglia is an actor, known for Igualita a mi (2010), Hortensia (2015) and Desmadre (2011).
biography.name: Andres Ciavaglia

biography.bio: Andrea Goldberg was born on October 16, 1965 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. She is an actress and director, known for Igualita a mi (2010), Vladimir in Buenos Aires (2002) and Tanga (2005).
biography.name: Andrea Goldberg

biography.bio: José Mehrez is an actor, known for Igualita a mi (2010), El sentido del miedo (2007) and Beinase (2006).
biography.name: José Mehrez

biography.bio: Melanie is an Argentinian Actress and Singer. She has performed as both since the age of 9 and since then has never stopped. Because she comes from an English family, her parents have spoken to her in English since she was born. Thanks to this, Melanie is completely bilingual and has been able to work for different countries. She has been in films, TV series, commercials and live performances. She is also a singer/songwriter and has been in several bands. She is currently working on a solo project which will be ready 2018.
biography.name: Melanie Green

biography.bio: Florencia Miller is an actress, known for Los vecinos en guerra (2013), Delirium (2014) and Igualita a mi (2010).
biography.name: Florencia Miller

biography.bio: Luly Drozdek is an actress, known for Igualita a mi (2010), La peluquería de Don Mateo (2016) and Morfi, todos a la mesa (2015).
biography.name: Luly Drozdek

biography.bio: Gabriela Canaves is an actress and director, known for Peluca y Marisita (2002), Igualita a mi (2010) and El Sentido (2013).
biography.name: Gabriela Canaves

biography.bio: Maria Belen Vigliero is an actress, known for Igualita a mi (2010).
biography.name: Maria Belen Vigliero

biography.bio: Lorenzo Meneghelli is an actor, known for Igualita a mi (2010) and Hortensia (2010).
biography.name: Lorenzo Meneghelli

awards.award: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences of Argentina 2010

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Award of the Argentinean Academy
Nominated Award of the Argentinean Academy

companyCreditsSimple.name: Instituto Nacional de Cine y Artes Audiovisuales (INCAA)
